Uses of Interface
com.sshtools.ssh.ChannelEventListener

  • Packages that use ChannelEventListener 
    Package Description
    com.sshtools.ssh
    This package contains a set of general interface contracts for SSH communication.
    com.sshtools.ssh2
    This package contains an SSH2 implementation of the com.maverick.ssh interfaces.

    • Uses of ChannelEventListener in com.sshtools.ssh

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChannelAdapter
      An adapter for the ChannelEventListener.

      void SshChannel.addChannelEventListener(ChannelEventListener listener)

      Open a TCPIP forwarding channel to the remote computer.
      SshSession SshClient.openSessionChannel(ChannelEventListener listener)
      Open a session on the remote computer.
